title: Geronimo Stilton
overview:
Geronimo Stilton is an animated children's television series based on the book series of the same name about the titular character, a mouse journalist and head of the 
Geronimo Stilton Media Group. He searches New Mouse City for new scoops 
while having adventures along the way with his nephew Benjamin, cousin 
Trap, and younger sister Thea Stilton.
